section.name: HtmlUnit plugin
section.p: The following sample testcases illustrate the conciseness of JWebUnit versus HtmlUnit and JUnit alone. The tests perform a google search for the HtmlUnit home page, navigate to that page from Google, and validate that there is a link to the user manual on the HtmlUnit home page. The code in the first column is pure HtmlUnit / JUnit, while the second column uses the JWebUnit framework.

section.name: HowTo manage dependencies with Maven 2
section.p:
Just add the following dependency to your pom:
... <dependencies> ... <dependency> <groupId>net.sourceforge.jwebunit</groupId> <artifactId>jwebunit-htmlunit-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.0</version> </dependency> ... </dependencies> ...
